languages.text: {n}Поддержка Вольного Торговца помогла монаху преклонных лет избраться настоятелем. Равно известный набожностью и ярым недоверием к грамоте Инокрант решительно провозгласил Ордену, что неведание есть благость, и категорически запретил медитации постижения над святынями Когнация. Окружив себя людьми простыми и темными, но ревностными, он проповедовал черни об ограниченности познания и абсолютном превосходстве верования.{/n}

{n}The support of the Rogue Trader aided the elderly monk in being elected prelate. Equally famous for his piety and ardent distrust of literacy, Inocrant has vigorously proclaimed to the Order that ignorance is bliss, expressly forbidding any meditation of comprehension at the shrines of Cognatius. Surrounding himself with illiterate zealots, he preached to the mob about the limitations of knowledge and the absolute superiority of faith.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Поддержка Вольного Торговца помогла монаху преклонных лет избраться настоятелем. Равно известный набожностью и ярым недоверием к грамоте Инокрант решительно провозгласил Ордену, что неведание есть благость, и категорически запретил медитации постижения над святынями Когнация. Окружив себя людьми простыми и темными, но ревностными, он проповедовал черни об ограниченности познания и абсолютном превосходстве верования.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The support of the Rogue Trader allowed the elderly monk to get elected as an abbot. Equally famous for his piety and ardent distrust of literacy, Enocrant had vigorously proclaimed to the Order that ignorance is bliss, and expressly forbade the meditations of Comprehension at the shrines of Cognatius. Surrounding himself with illiterate zealots, he preached to the mob about the limitations of knowledge and the absolute superiority of faith.{/n}

Surrounding himself with illiterate zealots, he preached to the mob about the limitations of knowledge and the absolute superiority of faith.{/n}

Surrounding himself with illiterate zealots, he preached to the mob about the limitations of knowledge and the absolute superiority of faith.{/n}

Surrounding himself with illiterate zealots, he preached to the mob about the limitations of knowledge and the absolute superiority of faith.{/n}

languages.text: {n}在行商浪人的支持下，老僧侣被选为教长。伊诺柯兰特以虔诚和对文化的强烈抵触而闻名，同时，他大力在修会内宣扬无知是福，明确禁止在科尼亚蒂乌斯神殿里进行任何的理解冥想。他致力于向群众宣扬知识的局限与信仰的绝对优越，身边聚集了大量目不识丁的狂热教众。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The support of the Rogue Trader aided the elderly monk in being elected prelate. Equally famous for his piety and ardent distrust of literacy, Inocrant has vigorously proclaimed to the Order that ignorance is bliss, expressly forbidding any meditation of comprehension at the shrines of Cognatius. Surrounding himself with illiterate zealots, he preached to the mob about the limitations of knowledge and the absolute superiority of faith.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在行商浪人的支持下，老僧侣被选为教长。伊诺柯兰特以虔诚和对文化的强烈抵触而闻名，同时，他大力在修会内宣扬无知是福，明确禁止在科尼亚蒂乌斯神殿里进行任何的理解冥想。他致力于向群众宣扬知识的局限与信仰的绝对优越，身边聚集了大量目不识丁的狂热教众。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El apoyo {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente ayudó al anciano monje a ser elegido prelado. Famoso a partes iguales por su piedad y su ardiente desconfianza al alfabetismo, Inocrant proclamó enérgicamente a la Orden que la ignorancia es una bendición, y prohibió expresamente toda meditación de comprensión en los santuarios de Cognatius. Rodeándose de fanáticos analfabetos, predicó a la plebe las limitaciones del conocimiento y la superioridad absoluta de la fe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The support of the Rogue Trader aided the elderly monk in being elected prelate. Equally famous for his piety and ardent distrust of literacy, Inocrant has vigorously proclaimed to the Order that ignorance is bliss, expressly forbidding any meditation of comprehension at the shrines of Cognatius. Surrounding himself with illiterate zealots, he preached to the mob about the limitations of knowledge and the absolute superiority of faith.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El apoyo {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente ayudó al anciano monje a ser elegido prelado. Famoso a partes iguales por su piedad y su ardiente desconfianza al alfabetismo, Inocrant proclamó enérgicamente a la Orden que la ignorancia es una bendición, y prohibió expresamente toda meditación de comprensión en los santuarios de Cognatius. Rodeándose de fanáticos analfabetos, predicó a la plebe las limitaciones del conocimiento y la superioridad absoluta de la fe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ローグトレーダーの支援により、老修道士が司教に選出された。イノクラントは、信心深さと識字に対する強烈な不信感を唱えたことで同様に有名だが、修道会に対しては知らぬが仏と力強く宣言し、コグナティウスの聖堂で理解を得るための瞑想を公然と禁じている。彼は読み書きのできない熱心な者たちに囲まれ、知識の限界と信仰の絶対的優位性を連中達に説いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The support of the Rogue Trader aided the elderly monk in being elected prelate. Equally famous for his piety and ardent distrust of literacy, Inocrant has vigorously proclaimed to the Order that ignorance is bliss, expressly forbidding any meditation of comprehension at the shrines of Cognatius. Surrounding himself with illiterate zealots, he preached to the mob about the limitations of knowledge and the absolute superiority of faith.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ローグトレーダーの支援により、老修道士が修道院長に選出された。イノクラントは、信心深さと識字に対する強烈な不信感を唱えたことで同様に有名だが、修道会に対しては知らぬが仏と力強く宣言し、コグナティウスの聖堂で理解を得るための瞑想を公然と禁じている。彼は読み書きのできない熱心な者たちに囲まれ、知識の限界と信仰の絶対的優位性を連中達に説いた。{/n}
{n}ローグトレーダーの支援により、老修道士が修道院長に選出された。イノクラントは、信心深さと識字に対する強烈な不信感を唱えたことで同様に有名だが、修道会に対しては知らぬが仏と力強く宣言し、コグナティウスの聖堂で理解を得るための瞑想を公然と禁じている。彼は読み書きのできない熱心な者たちに囲まれ、知識の限界と信仰の絶対的優位性を連中達に説いた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Fort du soutien {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, le doyen est élu prélat. Aussi connu pour sa piété que sa méfiance farouche à l'égard de toute forme d'alphabétisation, Inocrant proclame vigoureusement à l'Ordre que l'ignorance est une bénédiction, et frappe d'interdiction toute recherche de nouvelles formes de compréhension dans les sanctuaires de Cognatius. Entouré de zélotes illettrés, il se met alors à prêcher publiquement les limites de la connaissance et la supériorité absolue de la foi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The support of the Rogue Trader aided the elderly monk in being elected prelate. Equally famous for his piety and ardent distrust of literacy, Inocrant has vigorously proclaimed to the Order that ignorance is bliss, expressly forbidding any meditation of comprehension at the shrines of Cognatius. Surrounding himself with illiterate zealots, he preached to the mob about the limitations of knowledge and the absolute superiority of faith.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Fort du soutien {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, le doyen est élu prélat. Aussi connu pour sa piété que sa méfiance farouche à l'égard de toute forme d'alphabétisation, Inocrant proclame vigoureusement à l'Ordre que l'ignorance est une bénédiction, et frappe d'interdiction toute recherche de nouvelles formes de compréhension dans les sanctuaires de Cognatius. Entouré de zélotes illettrés, il se met alors à prêcher publiquement les limites de la connaissance et la supériorité absolue de la foi.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Durch die Unterstützung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} wurde er alte Mönch zum Prälaten gewählt. Inocrant ist ebenso berühmt für seine Frömmigkeit wie für sein glühendes Misstrauen gegenüber der Fähigkeit des Lesens. Er predigt leidenschaftlich die Glückseligkeit des Unwissens und verbietet an den Schreinen des Cognatius ausdrücklich jede Meditation der Erkenntnis. Er umgibt sich mit analphabetischen Eiferern und predigt von den Beschränkungen des Wissens und der absoluten Überlegenheit des Glaubens.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The support of the Rogue Trader aided the elderly monk in being elected prelate. Equally famous for his piety and ardent distrust of literacy, Inocrant has vigorously proclaimed to the Order that ignorance is bliss, expressly forbidding any meditation of comprehension at the shrines of Cognatius. Surrounding himself with illiterate zealots, he preached to the mob about the limitations of knowledge and the absolute superiority of faith.{/n}

{n}Durch die Unterstützung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} wurde er alte Mönch zum Abt gewählt. Inocrant ist ebenso berühmt für seine Frömmigkeit wie für sein glühendes Misstrauen gegenüber der Fähigkeit des Lesens. Er predigt leidenschaftlich die Glückseligkeit des Unwissens und verbietet an den Schreinen des Cognatius ausdrücklich jede Meditation der Erkenntnis. Er umgibt sich mit analphabetischen Eiferern und predigt von den Beschränkungen des Wissens und der absoluten Überlegenheit des Glaubens.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hür Tacir'in desteği, ihtiyar keşişin piskopos seçilmesine yardımda bulundu. Hem dindarlığıyla hem de okuryazarlığa karşı duyduğu hararetli şüpheyle meşhur olan İnocrant, Tarikat'a tüm gücüyle cehaletin mutluluk olduğunu ilan ederek Cognatius mabetlerinde en ufak bir idrak düşüncesini bile açıkça yasakladı. Okuryazar olmayan bağnazlarla etrafını dolduran İnocrant, güruha irfan sınırlamaları ve inancın mutlak üstünlüğü hakkında vaazlar verdi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The support of the Rogue Trader aided the elderly monk in being elected prelate. Equally famous for his piety and ardent distrust of literacy, Inocrant has vigorously proclaimed to the Order that ignorance is bliss, expressly forbidding any meditation of comprehension at the shrines of Cognatius. Surrounding himself with illiterate zealots, he preached to the mob about the limitations of knowledge and the absolute superiority of faith.{/n}
